vernac_cmds: refine (Build_Filter _ [ N:Ensemble (point_set X) | neighborhood N x0 ] _ _ _ _).
exists Full_set; repeat split; auto with sets topology.
Definition filter_limit {X:TopologicalSpace} (F:Filter (point_set X)) (x0:point_set X) : Prop := Included (filter_family (neighborhood_filter x0)) (filter_family F).
Definition filter_cluster_point {X:TopologicalSpace} (F:Filter (point_set X)) (x0:point_set X) : Prop := forall S:Ensemble (point_set X), In (filter_family F) S -> In (closure S) x0.
Lemma filter_limit_is_cluster_point: forall {X:TopologicalSpace} (F:Filter (point_set X)) (x0:point_set X), filter_limit F x0 -> filter_cluster_point F x0.
exists U; repeat split; auto with sets.
Lemma ultrafilter_cluster_point_is_limit: forall {X:TopologicalSpace} (F:Filter (point_set X)) (x0:point_set X), filter_cluster_point F x0 -> ultrafilter F -> filter_limit F x0.
intros; apply filter_upward_closed with U; trivial.

Lemma closure_impl_filter_limit: forall {X:TopologicalSpace} (S:Ensemble (point_set X)) (x0:point_set X), In (closure S) x0 -> exists F:Filter (point_set X), In (filter_family F) S /\ filter_limit F x0.
unshelve refine (let H1:=_ in let H2:=_ in let H3:=_ in let Sfilt := Build_Filter_from_basis (Singleton S) H1 H2 H3 in _).
exists S; split; auto with sets.
unshelve refine (let H4:=_ in ex_intro _ (filter_sum (neighborhood_filter x0) Sfilt H4) _).
exists S; split; auto with sets.
exists S; split; auto with sets.

Lemma continuous_function_preserves_filter_limits: forall (X Y:TopologicalSpace) (f:point_set X -> point_set Y) (x:point_set X) (F:Filter (point_set X)), filter_limit F x -> continuous_at f x -> filter_limit (filter_direct_image f F) (f x).

Lemma func_preserving_filter_limits_is_continuous: forall (X Y:TopologicalSpace) (f:point_set X -> point_set Y) (x:point_set X), (forall F:Filter (point_set X), filter_limit F x -> filter_limit (filter_direct_image f F) (f x)) -> continuous_at f x.

command: refine (Build_Filter _ [ N:Ensemble (point_set X) | neighborhood N x0 ] _ _ _ _).
exists Full_set; repeat split; auto with sets topology.
exists U; repeat split; auto with sets.
intros; apply filter_upward_closed with U; trivial.
unshelve refine (let H1:=_ in let H2:=_ in let H3:=_ in let Sfilt := Build_Filter_from_basis (Singleton S) H1 H2 H3 in _).
exists S; split; auto with sets.
unshelve refine (let H4:=_ in ex_intro _ (filter_sum (neighborhood_filter x0) Sfilt H4) _).
exists S; split; auto with sets.
exists S; split; auto with sets.
